articles.title: Fan-Made Nintendo Network Replacement 'Pretendo' No Longer Requires Hacked Wii U - Nintendo Life
articles.content:
Image: Zion Grassl / Nintendo Life
Official online functionality for the Wii U and 3DS may be no more (as of today, 9th April), but unofficial Nintendo Network replacements are already out there. Wh… [+1659 chars]
